summary:
WePiggy Dynamics - WePiggy has been deployed on various well-known public chains and Layer 2 networks such as Ethereum, OKXChain (OKC), Binance Smart Chain (BSC), Polygon, Huobi Eco Chain (HECO), Arbitrum, Optimism, Moonriver, Harmony, Oasis Emerald, Aurora, Moonbeam and will soon be launched on Kava etc., realizing the exchange and lending of cross-chain assets.

  -
